items.name: Broken Vessel
items.how-to-find: Broken Vessel can be found near the far west corner of the Ancient Basin, guarding the Monarch Wings Ability.

items.name: Brooding Mawlek
items.how-to-find: The Brooding Mawlek in the Forgotten Crossroads is found beyond a wall jump section in a blocked room to the left of the vertical shaft filled with Gruzzers and Tiktiks.

items.name: The Collector
items.how-to-find: The Collector is locked in the Tower of Love, which can only be accessed using the Love Key, found in the Queen's Gardens. The Tower can only be entered from the deep lift shaft between Kingdom's Edge and the City of Tears.

items.name: Dung Defender
items.how-to-find: Dung Defender is located in the east part of the Royal Waterways.

items.name: False Knight
items.how-to-find: False Knight is located in the centre of the Forgotten Crossroads.

items.name: Gruz Mother
items.how-to-find: Gruz Mother can be found in the Forgotten Crossroads, sleeping peacefully until disturbed.

items.name: Hornet Protector
items.how-to-find: Hornet Protector can be fought in Greenpath.

items.name: Hornet Sentinel
items.how-to-find: Hornet Sentinel can be fought in the Kingdom's Edge.

items.name: Mantis Lords
items.how-to-find: The area that the Mantis Lords are located in can be accessed after obtaining the Mantis Claw and activating a lever in the northeast part of the Mantis Village.

items.name: Nosk
items.how-to-find: A breakable wall in the room directly west of the Deepnest Hot Spring reveals a secret section containing a Grub. Breaking another wall behind the Grub leads to the tunnels and into Nosk's lair.

items.name: Soul Master
items.how-to-find: Soul Master is located in the upper part of Soul Sanctum.

items.name: Traitor Lord
items.how-to-find: The Traitor Lord is located in the upper section of the Queen's Gardens, beyond a Shade Gate.

items.name: Uumuu
items.how-to-find: Uumuu is located in the centre of the Teacher's Archives.

items.name: Watcher Knight
items.how-to-find: The Watcher Knights are located near the top of Watcher's Spire.

items.name: Wayward Compass
items.how-to-find: Bought from Iselda in Dirtmouth for 220 after the first encounter with Cornifer.

items.name: Gathering Swarm
items.how-to-find: Bought from Sly in Dirtmouth for 300.

items.name: Stalwart Shell
items.how-to-find: Bought from Sly in Dirtmouth for 200.

items.name: Soul Catcher
items.how-to-find: Found at the very end of the Ancestral Mound, after killing the Elder Baldur.

items.name: Shaman Stone
items.how-to-find: Bought from Salubra for 220 in the Forgotten Crossroads.

items.name: Soul Eater
items.how-to-find: Found in the Resting Grounds.

items.name: Dashmaster
items.how-to-find: Found beneath a statue below the Mantis Village in the Fungal Wastes, near the entrance to the Royal Waterways.

items.name: Thorns of Agony
items.how-to-find: Found in Greenpath in a maze of thorns featuring Charged Lumaflies.

items.name: Fury of the Fallen
items.how-to-find: Found in King's Pass, the starting cavern, behind a spike-filled cavern.

items.name: Quick Focus
items.how-to-find: Bought from Salubra in the Forgotten Crossroads for 800.

items.name: Deep Focus
items.how-to-find: Found in Crystal Peak in a hidden cave made entirely of crystals.

items.name: Baldur Shell
items.how-to-find: This Charm is located in the southwest portion of the Howling Cliffs.

items.name: Fragile Heart / Unbreakable Heart
items.how-to-find: Bought from Leg Eater for 350 in the Fungal Wastes.

items.name: Fragile Greed / Unbreakable Greed
items.how-to-find: Bought from Leg Eater for 250 in the Fungal Wastes.

items.name: Fragile Strength / Unbreakable Strength
items.how-to-find: Bought from Leg Eater for 600 in the Fungal Wastes.

items.name: Spell Twister
items.how-to-find: Found in a hidden room in the Soul Sanctum.

items.name: Steady Body
items.how-to-find: Bought from Salubra in the Forgotten Crossroads for 120.

items.name: Heavy Blow
items.how-to-find: Bought from Sly in Dirtmouth for 350 after giving him the Shopkeeper's Key.

items.name: Quick Slash
items.how-to-find: Found at the very east of Kingdom's Edge guarded by a horde of Hivelings.

items.name: Longnail
items.how-to-find: Bought from Salubra in the Forgotten Crossroads for 300.

items.name: Mark of Pride
items.how-to-find: Reward for defeating the Mantis Lords in the Fungal Wastes.

items.name: Flukenest
items.how-to-find: Found in the Royal Waterways, in the arena of the Flukemarm.

items.name: Defender's Crest
items.how-to-find: Reward for defeating Dung Defender in the Royal Waterways.

items.name: Glowing Womb
items.how-to-find: Found in the Forgotten Crossroads, in a small hidden room near the False Knight's arena.

items.name: Lifeblood Heart
items.how-to-find: Bought from Salubra for 250 in the Forgotten Crossroads.

items.name: Lifeblood Core
items.how-to-find: Found in the Abyss, behind a door that requires 15 Lifeblood Masks.

items.name: Joni's Blessing
items.how-to-find: Found in Joni's Repose in Howling Cliffs.

items.name: Grubsong
items.how-to-find: Reward for rescuing 10 Grubs.

items.name: Grubberfly's Elegy
items.how-to-find: Reward for rescuing all 46 Grubs.

items.name: Hiveblood
items.how-to-find: Found in the Hive, in a room guarded by the Hive Knight.

items.name: Spore Shroom
items.how-to-find: Found in the Fungal Wastes near the Queen's Gardens entrance.

items.name: Sharp Shadow
items.how-to-find: Found in Deepnest in a hidden area filled with spikes.

items.name: Shape of Unn
items.how-to-find: Obtained from Unn herself in Greenpath by having 1 Simple Key and using the Lake of Unn bench.

items.name: Nailmaster's Glory
items.how-to-find: Reward from Sly after learning all three Nail Arts.

items.name: Dream Wielder
items.how-to-find: Given by the Seer after collecting 500 Essence.

items.name: Kingsoul / Void Heart
items.how-to-find: Formed by combining the two halves from White Palace and Queen's Gardens; later becomes Void Heart.

items.name: Trial of the Warrior
items.how-to-find: Available in the Colosseum of Fools; requires 100 Geo to open. First clear rewards a Charm Notch and Geo.

items.name: Trial of the Conqueror
items.how-to-find: Second trial in the Colosseum of Fools; requires completing Trial of the Warrior and 450 Geo to open. First clear rewards Pale Ore and Geo.

items.name: Trial of the Fool
items.how-to-find: Third trial in the Colosseum of Fools; requires completing Trial of the Conqueror and 800 Geo to open. Rewards Geo and achievements on clear.

items.name: Herrah the Beast
items.how-to-find: Herrah's physical body is located in the Beast's Den in Deepnest.

items.name: Lurien the Watcher
items.how-to-find: Lurien's body is in Watcher's Spire in the City of Tears; defeat the Watcher Knights to reach him.

items.name: Monomon the Teacher
items.how-to-find: Monomon's body is in the Teacher's Archives in Fog Canyon; Uumuu must be defeated to reach her.

items.name: Dream Nail acquired
items.how-to-find: Obtained by inspecting the Dreamers' memorial in the Resting Grounds (a Moth gives the Dream Nail).

items.name: Awakening the Dream Nail
items.how-to-find: Awoken after collecting 1800 Essence and returning to the Seer in the Resting Grounds.

items.name: Hear the Seer's final words
items.how-to-find: Return to the Seer in the Resting Grounds after collecting Essence rewards (up to 2400 Essence) to hear the Seer's final words.

items.name: Crystal Heart
items.how-to-find: Found in Crystal Peak at the end of a platforming segment; requires Mantis Claw and Mothwing Cloak to reach.

items.name: Isma's Tear
items.how-to-find: Located in Isma's Grove (Royal Waterways); access requires Crystal Heart and defeating Dung Defender (or progressing to that region).

items.name: King's Brand
items.how-to-find: Found in the Cast-Off Shell in Kingdom's Edge, guarded by Hornet; normally requires Monarch Wings (or early nail-bounce skips) to reach.

items.name: Mantis Claw
items.how-to-find: Located in the Mantis Village (Fungal Wastes).

items.name: Monarch Wings
items.how-to-find: Found in the Ancient Basin just after the Broken Vessel boss fight; Crystal Heart is required for some approaches.

items.name: Mothwing Cloak
items.how-to-find: Found on a Vessel's body after defeating Hornet in Greenpath.

items.name: Shade Cloak
items.how-to-find: Located in the Abyss (far east); activate the lighthouse to suppress the Void Tendrils, then stand in the Void fountain to obtain it.

items.name: Mask Upgrade 1
items.how-to-find: Mask shards are found across Hallownest in multiple locations and as rewards; see the Mask Shard page for per-shard locations.

items.name: Mask Upgrade 2
items.how-to-find: Mask shards are found across Hallownest in multiple locations and as rewards; see the Mask Shard page for per-shard locations.

items.name: Mask Upgrade 3
items.how-to-find: Mask shards are found across Hallownest in multiple locations and as rewards; see the Mask Shard page for per-shard locations.

items.name: Mask Upgrade 4
items.how-to-find: Mask shards are found across Hallownest in multiple locations and as rewards; see the Mask Shard page for per-shard locations.

items.name: Cyclone Slash
items.how-to-find: Taught by Nailmaster Mato in the Howling Cliffs.

items.name: Dash Slash
items.how-to-find: Taught by Nailmaster Oro in Kingdom's Edge (can be purchased from Oro).

items.name: Great Slash
items.how-to-find: Taught by Nailmaster Sheo in Greenpath; requires Monarch Wings or Crystal Heart to reach.

items.name: Sharpened Nail
items.how-to-find: Nail upgrades are purchased from the Nailsmith using Geo and Pale Ore; see the Nail page for exact costs per upgrade.

items.name: Channelled Nail
items.how-to-find: Nail upgrades are purchased from the Nailsmith using Geo and Pale Ore; see the Nail page for exact costs per upgrade.

items.name: Coiled Nail
items.how-to-find: Nail upgrades are purchased from the Nailsmith using Geo and Pale Ore; see the Nail page for exact costs per upgrade.

items.name: Pure Nail
items.how-to-find: Nail upgrades are purchased from the Nailsmith using Geo and Pale Ore; see the Nail page for exact costs per upgrade.

items.name: Desolate Dive
items.how-to-find: Reward for defeating the Soul Master in the Soul Sanctum (City of Tears).

items.name: Descending Dark
items.how-to-find: Found on a snail shaman's corpse in Crystal Peak (Crystallised Mound).

items.name: Howling Wraiths
items.how-to-find: Found in the Overgrown Mound in Fog Canyon, near the entrance to the Queen's Gardens.

items.name: Abyss Shriek
items.how-to-find: Obtained in the Abyss by standing on the pedestal in the southwest Abyss room and using Howling Wraiths to unlock the spell.

items.name: Vengeful Spirit
items.how-to-find: Given by a Snail Shaman in the Ancestral Mound in the Forgotten Crossroads.

items.name: Shade Soul
items.how-to-find: Found behind a locked door in the Soul Sanctum (City of Tears); requires purchasing the Elegant Key from Sly (after the Shopkeeper's Key) and defeating the Soul Warrior in that room.

items.name: Vessel Upgrade 1
items.how-to-find: Vessel fragments are obtained across Hallownest: some are sold by Sly, some are found in specific locations (Greenpath, Deepnest, King's Station, Stag Nest, Ancient Basin fountain), and one is given by the Seer for Essence. See the Vessel Fragment page for the full list.

items.name: Vessel Upgrade 2
items.how-to-find: Vessel fragments are obtained across Hallownest: some are sold by Sly, some are found in specific locations (Greenpath, Deepnest, King's Station, Stag Nest, Ancient Basin fountain), and one is given by the Seer for Essence. See the Vessel Fragment page for the full list.

items.name: Vessel Upgrade 3
items.how-to-find: Vessel fragments are obtained across Hallownest: some are sold by Sly, some are found in specific locations (Greenpath, Deepnest, King's Station, Stag Nest, Ancient Basin fountain), and one is given by the Seer for Essence. See the Vessel Fragment page for the full list.

items.name: Elder Hu
items.how-to-find: Found at his memorial in the eastern Fungal Wastes; fight his spirit with the Dream Nail to collect Essence.

items.name: Galien
items.how-to-find: Galien's corpse/spirit is found in the west part of Deepnest.

items.name: Gorb
items.how-to-find: Gorb's grave is located in the northeast part of the Howling Cliffs.

items.name: Markoth
items.how-to-find: Markoth's spirit appears beyond a Shade Gate; the Shade Cloak is needed to bypass the gate (or find an alternate route).

items.name: Marmu
items.how-to-find: Marmu's spirit is found at a totem in the Queen's Gardens (west of the Stag Station).

items.name: No Eyes
items.how-to-find: No Eyes can be found inside the Stone Sanctuary in Greenpath.

items.name: Xero
items.how-to-find: Xero's spirit is located in the west part of the Resting Grounds.
